ChunkText: students with no first name or no last name in their passport often find this challenging to manage in the us, especially related to work permission, as the US system expects both a first and last name. please take the time to have any errors corrected before applying for your visa!
ContextBefore: once you enter the us, your official names in all documents are based on your passport, and it becomes much harder to change your name after you arrive.
ContextAfter: understand the f-1 visa process, tips and best practices: applying for an f-1 student visa 1. you must first be admitted to a college or university, and receive an I-20 from the school you plan to attend.
